Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains info on a player.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String playerName,
      int playerNumber,
      int balance,
      int oilBarrels,
      int gasBarrels)
        Constructor for objects of class player.
        Parameters:
        playerName - The player's name.
        playerNumber - The player's number.
        balance - The balance a player is to start off with.
        oilBarrels - Amount of oil barrels to start with.
        gasBarrels - Amount of petrol barrels to start with.

      • printGrid

        public void printGrid()
        Method that prints out the player's grid. Each asset the player holds is represented on the grid as a single letter.
